lead_paragraph: The high school coach who was fired after his girls basketball team won a game by 100-0 said he felt no need to apologize because he “did everything the right way.” Micah Grimes, who was fired days after the Covenant School of Dallas made national headlines with the victory against Dallas Academy in January, told ESPN in his first televised interview that he realized the inferiority of the opponent.
